title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: Is doombots a possibility?
I've never played URF before after the first two games and I fucking hate it. What a brilliant idea on paper but tilting as fuck in reality. Wanted to kill myself 0/10 would recommend.
obviously you don't understand the fact that the game mode is meant to be about the hilarity of spamming abilities, you ain't meant to care whether or not you win or lose, just have fun doing it.

Literally mute everyone from the start.  It's not about winning, it's just about complete and utter reckless carnage and just enjoying the chaos of it all.  

You don't need to communicate for that.  (Seriously, I highly recommend Sona full AP mid.  Very fun to play with her passive.)
Can you not recommend cancer champs please thanks.
But that makes it even more fun. KINDA LIKE GALIO! ;)
Ay lmao

I don't necessarily understand why Riot decided to make the time frame to play these game modes so slim, I mean not everyone will be able to experience the torture that is URF thanks to studying/working etc... I don't find it fair that not everyone is actually able to play these game modes why not expand the roster to like a week or so?
agreed, i go away for the weekend and come back to find URF IS HERE oh no wait its not cos its over??????????.........................................
OMG YESS, this is exactly what happened to me
doombots rito pls?
First time I played URF - it's amazing

**1.** MORE URF 
**2.** MORE URF
**3.** MORE URFFFF!!!
and i dont mean more urf skins.......  {{champion:105}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:19}} ....

I MEAN ULTRA RAPID FIRE

This game-mode is hands down **THE BEST GAME-MODE EVER RE-RELEASED** and should be put on ONCE A MONTH AT LEAST!!

Come on riot, you said with positive feedback you might extend it, well we love this quick paced feel so so much, and we want_** MONTHLY URFS**_ !! Thanks homies. ~~_Peace-out_~~ 


p.s more URF THE MANATEE skins would actually be nice too ^^), they're the best for trolling in URF game mode, so disregard what I said up there, I want skins AND u.r.f mode. MORE MORE MORE THANKS!
throw normals out and keep urf.. the other game isnt fun..
DOOMBOTS?
Doom Bots would be an awesome addition to the rotating queue
What about doom bots?
Y when I log into the game is URF nowhere to be found? QQQQQQQQQ
Urf is only out during a certain time in the day soo maybe thats why?
My game client wont give me the option the play URF?!?!?!?!?!
URF aka ban eve
have you even seen galio?

Please make this a permanent thing in bots.  Playing URF against AI would basically be just as good as a sandbox mode for practicing to me.  I don't speak for everyone, but I'd personally be pretty happy with that.
Then everyone would play bots and the hype from urf would be lost. Like saying would you rather have it 24/7 in bots or every 2nd month against other players?
I think so, that's a good thing to have more fun
Can we have a game mode where all of these or most of these game modes are combined like urf hexakill oneforall mirror mode or will this be just 2 much hype for league to handle
There are way too many things that would be exploited if URF and OFA was in the same game. It would never happen
What happened to{{item:3060}} :(
i dont understand why you keep changing from classic urf, which was amazing. all the recent urfs have just been getting worse and worse
When was urf supposed to end?
it is on from 11am-3am the following day over the weeknd so it ends monday at 3am. but i see this post is 5 hours old, so yes it was disabled at 3am but will be back on today saturday @ 11am
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} this is npt gonna be fun with kindred

I'm the guy who picks janna in one for all ;)
you're welcome for when it gets randomly selected.
I think that doom bots and dominion (for the freaking first time in OCE) would be cool
We literally had dominion last weekend.
We had Ascension last weekend? Dominion and Ascension are two completely different things
Good point, my mistake.
Stop nurfing everyone pls
why not add URF mode in coop vs AI games!
i dunno for certain but i'd imagine it'd be a pain in the ass programming the ai to fight with urf mechanics
Not true, they had it for when URF was first released in 2014, and when it was rereleased in 2015.
Rly Riot, you put URF on the one weekend I was out of internet access. Riot why?
Make these modes permanent, vanilla league is getting a tad boring
Then everyone would get so bad at the game. Riot/Tencent cant afford that.
Excuses
Why doesn't RIOT replace the Twisted Tree line queue with URF
Give it back... right now

Hey Riot, why increase peoples damage for? IT'S SO DAMN SILLY. What about make people have 100% more HP and 80% cool down reduction and leave it at that. Also make stuns 80% less effective other wise this is just a mode where you pick the most CC and it's fuking boring and not fun to play since you're locked down 100% of the time. Riot are morons.. along with anyone else who thinks this mode is fun.
